title: Defence minister says 'we're good' to meet 2% NATO spending target by March
description: Defence Minister David McGuinty assured MPs on Thursday that the federal government is on its way to meeting NATO's old, politically charged spending target of two per cent of GDP — just as the Western military alliance resets the bar.
content:
Canadas defence minister assured parliamentarians on Thursday that the federal government is well on its way to meeting NATO's old, politically charged spending target by next spring.
David McGuinty… [+2774 chars]
